data.title: When to go to Northern Spain ? Climate, Weather and Influx of tourists
data.meta_description: Travel at the best period! Contrary to popular belief, the climate of northern Spain lends itself to holidays all year round. Although the winters are certainly not as warm as in the rest of the country, don’t think
data.text:
Weather Zaragoza in January

37 to 51°

Sea: 32 °

16 d/month

8 d/month

3 d/month

2 d/month

2 d/month

In January, in Zaragoza, temperatures range from 3 to 11 degrees. Temperatures are low but with a lot of sunshine. The daily rainfall is around 19 inches, there are 26 days without rain in the month.

Check the weather over the last 5 years for the dates of your stay
